title: This service does not track you

tosdr.case: This service does not track you
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy policy states "When you signup to follow the MR HOMEBODY Blog, or submit a question, comment, or tip via the contact form, we do not know who you are." It also states, "MR HOMEBODY has no interest in your personal information, ever."

On the bottom of every page, beneath the "Follow" button, it states "We respect your privacy and will never share or sell your information."

When signing up to follow you do not have to provide a name. When contacting the blog through the contact form, you do not have provide a name or even an email. The privacy policy states, "When you submit a form to MR HOMEBODY (Questions, Comments, Tips) that information is never shared with anyone and is encrypted and stored securely via Tutanota. Additionally, you are not required to enter your name or email to remain further anonymous. *Please note: you will need to enter an email address if you wish to receive a response."

Lastly, again, the privacy policy states "Mr Homebody will never share your email, ever."
